comment: Enable DirectX Shifting and specify button offset.
Allows mouse wheel to turn knobs in 3d pit.
Captures the mouse when in 3D so that you don't click something on the desktop when running windowed mode.
If set, the 4th mouse button (if available) will toggle between mouselook and clickable pit. the wheel is button 3.
Sets how much the field of view should change for each keypress in degrees.
Limits the maximum amount that the FOV can be increased.
Defines the narrow field of view used by the "Look Closer" view command.
Makes the same clicks when the throttle passes the afterburner detent as it does when passing the Idle detent.
